tool_description: An API where you can  find council tax bands by postcode
name: Council tax bands by postcode API
title: Council tax bands by postcode API
tool_name: Council tax bands by postcode API

api_list.name: Get request for council tax bands by postcode
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://council-tax-bands-by-postcode-api.p.rapidapi.com/XaUExm/council_tax_bands_by_postcode"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "council-tax-bands-by-postcode-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
